title: Meatball Bake
description: Three meatballs baked in marinara with mozzarella on top and a scoop of ricotta on the side.
ingredients: 1 lb Ground Beef 1/2 cup Bread Crumbs 1/4 cup Parmesan Cheese 1 Egg 2 cups Marinara Sauce 1 1/2 cups Mozzarella Cheese 1/2 cup Ricotta Cheese
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Mix ground beef, bread crumbs, Parmesan, and egg. Form meatballs. Brown in a skillet.
2. Place meatballs in a baking dish with marinara sauce. Top with mozzarella.
3. Bake for 20-25 minutes. Serve with a scoop of ricotta.

title: Southern Fried Chicken
description: Crispy, golden-brown fried chicken with a savory and spicy coating.
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in buttermilk for 4 hours.
2. Mix flour, paprika, salt, and pepper. Dredge chicken.
3. Fry in oil at 350°F for 10-12 minutes per side.

title: Texas BBQ Brisket
description: Slow-smoked beef brisket with a flavorful dry rub, served with BBQ sauce.
instructions:
1. Rub brisket with spices. Let sit for 1 hour.
2. Smoke at 225°F until internal temp is 195°F.
3. Let rest 30 minutes before slicing. Serve with BBQ sauce.

title: New England Clam Chowder
description: A creamy soup filled with tender clams, potatoes, and onions.
instructions:
1. Cook bacon, then sauté onion.
2. Add potatoes and flour. Cook 2 minutes.
3. Add clams and cream. Simmer until clams open.

title: California Fish Tacos
description: Grilled fish tacos with fresh avocado, cabbage slaw, and lime crema.
instructions:
1. Season fish with chili powder. Grill 3-4 minutes per side.
2. Mix sour cream and lime juice. Assemble tacos with fish, avocado, cabbage, and crema.

title: Chicago Deep Dish Pizza
description: Thick, buttery crust filled with layers of cheese, sausage, and rich tomato sauce.
instructions:
1. Mix flour, cornmeal, salt, water, and butter. Let rise 1 hour.
2. Press dough into pan. Layer mozzarella, sausage, and tomatoes.
3. Bake at 425°F for 25-30 minutes.
